channel.title: Unique project out of the box server, looking for Graphic desginers
channel.description:
Hello, we're looking for a graphic artists for our on-going project realms of agony. To be exact we are looking a very talented person with a creative mind and variety of skills. We also have shutterstock subscription so we can provide you with more tools to work with. Req: Must be able to produce anything from logos to graphics to interfaces and to entire backgrounds.
If you want more information about the project feel free to pm Wimstr here or add Owners skype: mainazz2 Main owner (Jinzy) or astephanou05 co-owner/web desginer (Bonzer)
[B]Format:[/B] Age: Can follow instructions: Software that you are using: example, Photoshop 5 Portofolio: Skype: Additional information:
I could show current pictures of the server, but we're still working towards our beta. For the best introduction to the project, check out this topic:
Global project development information: http://www.realmsofagony.com/forums/index.php?/topic/5-realms-of-agony-development-blog/
[B]You need to be able to make something better than this, or make something on your own.[/B] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/wrc2ld.gif[/img][/QUOTE]
We hope to see you join the team soon.

item.title: Unique project out of the box server, looking for Graphic desginers
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

[quote=“google, post:8, topic:544053”][quote author=wimstr link=topic=662933.msg4433794#msg4433794 date=1404325488]
Bump

Looking for another designer/
[/quote]

Not meaning to grave dig, Are you still Working on this?[/quote]
Indeed we are but this is an outdated post.
We’ve progressed a lot further with Realms of Agony 718.
We currently have a great graphic designer so that’s out of the question.

If you look for more information about the project though, reply here or hit me up with a Private message.
Though i’m pretty sure i already seen you on the forums.

Read full topic
